data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Chachoengsao.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chachoengsao, Thailand
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Chachoengsao you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary: On average, 57 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Chachoengsao, Thailand.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Chachoengsao, Thailand and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Chachoengsao, Thailand to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Cham, Western people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, guide the church in Chachoengsao, Thailand to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Chachoengsao access to a Bible in their own language.
Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Chachoengsao, Thailand into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.
